entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023
